AI Description: TransDecoder identifies candidate coding regions within transcript sequences, such as those generated by de novo RNA-Seq transcript assembly using Trinity, or other full-length RNA-Seq datasets. It combines homology searches with open reading frame (ORF) detection to predict likely coding regions.
Core Features: Identifying Candidate Coding Regions Within Transcript Sequences, Homology Searches, Open Reading Frame (Orf) Detection, Prediction Of Likely Coding Regions
General Tags: Bioinformatics, Computational Biology, Transcriptomics, Protein Prediction
